00020 #include "SensorApplLayer.h"

00022 #include <sstream>

00024 #include "BaseNetwLayer.h"
00025 #include "AddressingInterface.h"
00026 #include "NetwControlInfo.h"

00042 void SensorApplLayer::initialize(int stage) {
00043     BaseLayer::initialize(stage);
00044   if (stage == 0) {
00045 
00046     debugEV<< "in initialize() stage 0...";
00047     debug = par("debug");
00048     stats = par("stats");
00049     trace = par("trace");
00050     nbPackets = par("nbPackets");
00051     trafficParam = par("trafficParam");
00052     initializationTime = par("initializationTime");
00053     broadcastPackets = par("broadcastPackets");
00054     headerLength = par("headerLength");
00055     // application configuration
00056     const char *traffic = par("trafficType");
00057     destAddr = LAddress::L3Type(par("destAddr").longValue());
00058     nbPacketsSent = 0;
00059     nbPacketsReceived = 0;
00060     firstPacketGeneration = -1;
00061     lastPacketReception = -2;
00062 
00063     initializeDistribution(traffic);
00064 
00065     delayTimer = new cMessage("appDelay", SEND_DATA_TIMER);
00066 
00067     // get pointer to the world module
00068     world = FindModule<BaseWorldUtility*>::findGlobalModule();
00069 
00070   } else if (stage == 1) {
00071     debugEV << "in initialize() stage 1...";
00072     // Application address configuration: equals to host address
00073 
00074     cModule *const pHost = findHost();
00075     const cModule* netw  = FindModule<BaseNetwLayer*>::findSubModule(pHost);
00076     if(!netw) {
00077       netw = pHost->getSubmodule("netwl");
00078       if(!netw) {
00079         opp_error("Could not find network layer module. This means "
00080               "either no network layer module is present or the "
00081               "used network layer module does not subclass from "
00082               "BaseNetworkLayer.");
00083       }
00084     }
00085     const AddressingInterface *const addrScheme = FindModule<AddressingInterface*>::findSubModule(pHost);
00086     if(addrScheme) {
00087       myAppAddr = addrScheme->myNetwAddr(netw);
00088     } else {
00089       myAppAddr = LAddress::L3Type( netw->getId() );
00090     }
00091     sentPackets = 0;
00092 
00093     // first packet generation time is always chosen uniformly
00094     // to avoid systematic collisions
00095     if(nbPackets> 0)
00096       scheduleAt(simTime() +uniform(initializationTime, initializationTime + trafficParam), delayTimer);
00097 
00098     if (stats) {
00099       latenciesRaw.setName("rawLatencies");
00100       latenciesRaw.setUnit("s");
00101       latency.setName("latency");
00102     }
00103   }
00104 }
00105 
00106 cStdDev& SensorApplLayer::hostsLatency(const LAddress::L3Type& hostAddress)
00107 {
00108   using std::pair;
00109 
00110   if(latencies.count(hostAddress) == 0) {
00111     std::ostringstream oss;
00112     oss << hostAddress;
00113     cStdDev aLatency(oss.str().c_str());
00114     latencies.insert(pair<LAddress::L3Type, cStdDev>(hostAddress, aLatency));
00115   }
00116 
00117   return latencies[hostAddress];
00118 }
00119 
00120 void SensorApplLayer::initializeDistribution(const char* traffic) {
00121   if (!strcmp(traffic, "periodic")) {
00122     trafficType = PERIODIC;
00123   } else if (!strcmp(traffic, "uniform")) {
00124     trafficType = UNIFORM;
00125   } else if (!strcmp(traffic, "exponential")) {
00126     trafficType = EXPONENTIAL;
00127   } else {
00128     trafficType = UNKNOWN;
00129     EV << "Error! Unknown traffic type: " << traffic << endl;
00130   }
00131 }
00132 
00133 void SensorApplLayer::scheduleNextPacket() {
00134   if (nbPackets > sentPackets && trafficType != 0) { // We must generate packets
00135 
00136     simtime_t waitTime = SIMTIME_ZERO;
00137 
00138     switch (trafficType) {
00139     case PERIODIC:
00140       waitTime = trafficParam;
00141       debugEV<< "Periodic traffic, waitTime=" << waitTime << endl;
00142       break;
00143       case UNIFORM:
00144       waitTime = uniform(0, trafficParam);
00145       debugEV << "Uniform traffic, waitTime=" << waitTime << endl;
00146       break;
00147       case EXPONENTIAL:
00148       waitTime = exponential(trafficParam);
00149       debugEV << "Exponential traffic, waitTime=" << waitTime << endl;
00150       break;
00151       case UNKNOWN:
00152       default:
00153       EV <<
00154       "Cannot generate requested traffic type (unimplemented or unknown)."
00155       << endl;
00156       return; // don not schedule
00157       break;
00158     }
00159     debugEV << "Start timer for a new packet in " << waitTime << " seconds." <<
00160     endl;
00161     scheduleAt(simTime() + waitTime, delayTimer);
00162     debugEV << "...timer rescheduled." << endl;
00163   } else {
00164     debugEV << "All packets sent.\n";
00165   }
00166 }
00167 
00171 void SensorApplLayer::handleLowerMsg(cMessage * msg) {
00172   ApplPkt *m;
00173 
00174   switch (msg->getKind()) {
00175   case DATA_MESSAGE:
00176     m = static_cast<ApplPkt *> (msg);
00177     nbPacketsReceived++;
00178     packet.setPacketSent(false);
00179     packet.setNbPacketsSent(0);
00180     packet.setNbPacketsReceived(1);
00181     packet.setHost(myAppAddr);
00182     emit(BaseLayer::catPacketSignal, &packet);
00183     if (stats) {
00184       simtime_t theLatency = m->getArrivalTime() - m->getCreationTime();
00185       if(trace) {
00186         hostsLatency(m->getSrcAddr()).collect(theLatency);
00187         latenciesRaw.record(SIMTIME_DBL(theLatency));
00188       }
00189       latency.collect(theLatency);
00190       if (firstPacketGeneration < 0)
00191         firstPacketGeneration = m->getCreationTime();
00192       lastPacketReception = m->getArrivalTime();
00193       if(trace) {
00194         debugEV<< "Received a data packet from host[" << m->getSrcAddr()
00195         << "], latency=" << theLatency
00196         << ", collected " << hostsLatency(m->getSrcAddr()).
00197         getCount() << "mean is now: " << hostsLatency(m->getSrcAddr()).
00198         getMean() << endl;
00199       } else {
00200           debugEV<< "Received a data packet from host[" << m->getSrcAddr()
00201           << "], latency=" << theLatency << endl;
00202       }
00203     }
00204     delete msg;
00205 
00206     //  sendReply(m);
00207     break;
00208     default:
00209     EV << "Error! got packet with unknown kind: " << msg->getKind() << endl;
00210     delete msg;
00211     break;
00212   }
00213 }
00214 
00223 void SensorApplLayer::handleSelfMsg(cMessage * msg) {
00224   switch (msg->getKind()) {
00225   case SEND_DATA_TIMER:
00226     sendData();
00227     //delete msg;
00228     break;
00229   default:
00230     EV<< "Unkown selfmessage! -> delete, kind: " << msg->getKind() << endl;
00231     delete msg;
00232     break;
00233   }
00234 }
00235 
00236 void SensorApplLayer::handleLowerControl(cMessage * msg) {
00237   delete msg;
00238 }
00239 
00244 void SensorApplLayer::sendData() {
00245   ApplPkt *pkt = new ApplPkt("Data", DATA_MESSAGE);
00246 
00247   if(broadcastPackets) {
00248     pkt->setDestAddr(LAddress::L3BROADCAST);
00249   } else {
00250     pkt->setDestAddr(destAddr);
00251   }
00252   pkt->setSrcAddr(myAppAddr);
00253   pkt->setByteLength(headerLength);
00254   // set the control info to tell the network layer the layer 3 address
00255   NetwControlInfo::setControlInfo(pkt, pkt->getDestAddr());
00256   debugEV<< "Sending data packet!\n";
00257   sendDown(pkt);
00258   nbPacketsSent++;
00259   packet.setPacketSent(true);
00260   packet.setNbPacketsSent(1);
00261   packet.setNbPacketsReceived(0);
00262   packet.setHost(myAppAddr);
00263   emit(BaseLayer::catPacketSignal, &packet);
00264   sentPackets++;
00265   scheduleNextPacket();
00266 }
00267 
00268 void SensorApplLayer::finish() {
00269   using std::map;
00270   if (stats) {
00271     if (trace) {
00272       std::stringstream osToStr(std::stringstream::out);
00273       // output logs to scalar file
00274       for (map<LAddress::L3Type, cStdDev>::iterator it = latencies.begin(); it != latencies.end(); ++it) {
00275         cStdDev aLatency = it->second;
00276 
00277         osToStr.str(""); osToStr << "latency" << it->first;
00278         recordScalar(osToStr.str().c_str(), aLatency.getMean(), "s");
00279         aLatency.record();
00280       }
00281     }
00282     recordScalar("activity duration", lastPacketReception
00283         - firstPacketGeneration, "s");
00284     recordScalar("firstPacketGeneration", firstPacketGeneration, "s");
00285     recordScalar("lastPacketReception", lastPacketReception, "s");
00286     recordScalar("nbPacketsSent", nbPacketsSent);
00287     recordScalar("nbPacketsReceived", nbPacketsReceived);
00288     latency.record();
00289   }
00290   cComponent::finish();
00291 }
00292 
00293 SensorApplLayer::~SensorApplLayer() {
00294   cancelAndDelete(delayTimer);
00295 }
